publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-143 Margo MacDonald: Writing Off Housing Debtâ€”That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive to demand from HM Treasury equality of treatment in respect of writing off historic housing debt for local authorities whose tenants voted against stock transfer, for example the City of Edinburgh, and those whose tenants voted in favour.
S3M-143 Writing Off Housing Debt (lodged on 8 June 2007) Bill Wilson*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-143 Writing Off Housing Debt (lodged on 8 June 2007) Kenneth Gibson*, Alex Neil*
S3M-143 Writing Off Housing Debt (lodged on 8 June 2007) Patrick Harvie*
S3M-143 Writing Off Housing Debt (lodged on 8 June 2007) Gil Paterson*
S3M-143 Writing Off Housing Debt (lodged on 8 June 2007) Dave Thompson*
S3M-143 Writing Off Housing Debt (lodged on 8 June 2007) Bob Doris*
